name: The Orange Alliance
description: The Orange Alliance is a project to help make FIRST Tech Challenge (FTC) information more accessible.  This app is the easiest way to access all the great content on http://theorangealliance.org on your Android device.  Are you a developer? Check out the source on GitHub: https://github.com/orange-alliance  Feel free to reach out to us through our Discord serve or contact us at contact@theorangealliance.org.
